definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: In this paper, we propose a mathematical model of planar reflector on the Solar pond.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了太阳池反射板的数学模型，并进行了计算。

sentences.english: A mathematical model for optimizing topological design of local-area networks is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了计算机局域网优化设计问题的数学模型。

sentences.english: An analytical model is established for axisymmetric parts in deep drawing.
sentences.chinese: 建立了轴对称件拉深法兰起皱的数学模型。

sentences.english: The main content includes:1, It studies the mathematical models and working mechanisms of the charge pump PLL (CPPLL) with high-performance.
sentences.chinese: 研究了高性能电荷泵型锁相环的数学模型和工作机制。

sentences.english: The mathematic model describing shift and synchronizing process was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了惯性式同步器接合过程数学模型。

sentences.english: Chapter IV of the mathematical model for the flow and boundary conditions.
sentences.chinese: 第四章为渗流数学模型及定解条件。

sentences.english: Chapter 2 is seepage numerical model and boundary condition.
sentences.chinese: 第二章为渗流数学模型及定解条件。

sentences.english: A dynamic mathematical model for surface heaters is presented in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 建立了表面式加热器的高精度的动态数学模型。

sentences.english: The mathematical models of the vibration of beams are given by fourth-order boundary value problems.
sentences.chinese: 四阶边值问题给出了梁振动的数学模型。

sentences.english: A mathematical model has been established for fluid flow and heat transfer in weld pool with a deformed surface.
sentences.chinese: 建立了熔池表面存在变形的流场与热场的数学模型。

sentences.english: Mathematical model of space robots based on twist denotations is deduced.
sentences.chinese: 推导了旋量表示的空间机器人数学模型。

sentences.english: The author has put forward a mathematical model of kinematics for tractor gearbox.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了变速箱运动学的数学模型。

sentences.english: Rolling force model is the crucial model for process control in cold rolling.
sentences.chinese: 轧制力数学模型是冷轧工艺控制系统的中枢模型。

sentences.english: A restoration algorithm based on the mathematical models of point-spread function was proposed and a Wiener filter algorithm avoiding the.
sentences.chinese: 并通过建立相应的数学模型推导了系统的点扩展函数。

sentences.english: "We wanted to describe this using a mathematical model similar to that of fluid flow, " Kasimov said.
sentences.chinese: 我们想用类似于液体力学的数学模型来解释堵车现象。

sentences.english: A new mathematical model for double-bridge converter is presented, by means of the Boolean variable.
sentences.chinese: 利用布尔交量推导出了双桥换流器一种新的数学模型。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
Bayes (name)/Thomas Bayes (1702-1761), English mathematician and theologian
